org.kepler.objectmanager.classloader

Class JarClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.kepler.objectmanager.classloader.JarClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JarClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Author:
    tao This class will load the given jar files(specified by URL) into JVM. This class will suport to Object manager to dynamic load jar files into memory

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JarClassLoader(java.net.URL[] url)
      Constructor (currently we only support url points to jar file rather than the directory

      void loadJarFiles()
      This method will load classes in the jar files into jvm
